code:
const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';export const api={get:endpoint=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});},post:(endpoint,data)=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});},put:(endpoint,data)=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});},delete:endpoint=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});},upload:(endpoint,formData)=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'POST',body:formData});},// Special method for admin requests with access key
adminPost:(endpoint,data)=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','x-admin-access':process.env.REACT_APP_ADMIN_ACCESS_KEY||'admin123'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});},adminPut:(endpoint,data)=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','x-admin-access':process.env.REACT_APP_ADMIN_ACCESS_KEY||'admin123'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});},adminDelete:endpoint=>{return fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL).concat(endpoint),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','x-admin-access':process.env.REACT_APP_ADMIN_ACCESS_KEY||'admin123'}});}};
